# Retro Snake Classic

A browser-compatible version of the classic Snake game with modern enhancements and AI insights.

## Features

- **Pure JavaScript**: No dependencies, runs in any modern browser
- **Retro Aesthetics**: Classic green-on-black terminal styling with subtle effects
- **Enhanced Gameplay**: Dynamic speed increase, visual effects, and smooth animations
- **AI Insights**: Educational tips about game strategy and AI concepts
- **Keyboard Shortcuts**: Multiple control schemes for accessibility

## How to Play

1. Open `index.html` in any web browser
2. Click "Start/Pause" or press Space to begin
3. Use WASD or Arrow Keys to control the snake
4. Eat yellow food to grow and increase your score
5. Avoid walls and your own tail

## Controls

- **Movement**: WASD or Arrow Keys
- **Pause/Resume**: Space or P key
- **Reset**: R key or Reset button
- **AI Insights**: Toggle button to see gameplay tips

## Game Mechanics

- Score increases by 10 points per food item
- Speed gradually increases as you score more points
- Game tracks time and calculates efficiency (points per second)
- Visual effects include tail fading and food pulsing

## Technical Details

- Built with vanilla HTML5 Canvas and JavaScript
- 60fps rendering with optimized game loop
- Responsive design that works on desktop and mobile
- Pixel-perfect retro graphics with modern smoothing

## Connection to AI Project

This classic version serves as the foundation for our AI-driven Snake game. It demonstrates:
- Core game mechanics that the AI analyzes
- Player behavior patterns that inform AI decisions
- Base gameplay that AI systems enhance and adapt

## Browser Compatibility

Works in all modern browsers including:
- Chrome/Chromium
- Firefox
- Safari
- Edge

No installation or build process required - just open and play!
